org.sedlakovi.celery

Annotation Type Task


  • @Retention(value=CLASS)
 @Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface Task
    Marks your code as a Celery Task.

    The annotation processor included in this package then generates two classes - *Proxy and *Loader. The loader is

    All parameters and return types must be JSON-serializable.

    In order for the Worker to find your Tasks, you must register them as a service in META-INF/services. An easy way to do it is to annotate your Task implementation with org.kohsuke.MetaInfServices annotation. See example tasks in the examples module.
